5112.verse: أَلَمْ|Do not|64|71|348$تَرَ|you see|72|86|2301$إِلَى|[to]|53|67|118$ٱلَّذِينَ|those who|89|103|20$نُهُواْ|were forbidden|118|132|4634$عَنِ|from|54|68|1663$ٱلنَّجْوَىٰ|secret counsels,|129|143|11489$ثُمَّ|then|50|57|293$يَعُودُونَ|they return|97|110|16703$لِمَا|to what|72|98|426$نُهُواْ|they were forbidden|153|179|4634$عَنْهُ|from [it],|80|106|3938$وَيَتَنَـٰجَوْنَ|and they hold secret counsels|220|233|16716$بِٱلْإِثْمِ|for sin|68|88|802$وَٱلْعُدْوَٲنِ|and aggression|119|160|803$وَمَعْصِيَتِ|and disobedience|134|175|16717$ٱلرَّسُولِ|(to) the Messenger?|155|196|4120$وَإِذَا|And when|85|106|96$جَآءُوكَ|they come to you,|143|152|4125$حَيَّوْكَ|they greet you|119|136|16718$بِمَا|with what|86|104|43$لَمْ|not|42|60|63$يُحَيِّكَ|greets you|91|108|16719$بِهِ|therewith|83|100|204$ٱللَّهُ|Allah,|56|65|2323$وَيَقُولُونَ|and they say|107|120|3019$فِىٓ|among|63|89|89$أَنفُسِهِمْ|themselves,|99|125|1025$لَوْلَا|`Why (does) not|132|158|1090$يُعَذِّبُنَا ٱللَّهُ|Allah punish us|118|144|16720$بِمَا|for what|76|89|43$نَقُولُ‌ۚ|we say?`|82|104|5491$حَسْبُهُمْ|Sufficient (for) them|156|199|7721$جَهَنَّمُ|(is) Hell,|75|118|1813$يَصْلَوْنَهَا‌ۖ|they will burn in it|139|182|9616$فَبِئْسَ|and worst is|101|122|3596$ٱلْمَصِيرُ|the destination.|125|125|1162$

5113.verse: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓاْ|O you who believe!|197|228|7177$إِذَا|When|57|118|1370$تَنَـٰجَيْتُمْ|you hold secret counsel|178|239|16721$فَلَا|then (do) not|110|140|208$تَتَنَـٰجَوْاْ|hold secret counsel|149|162|16722$بِٱلْإِثْمِ|for sin|68|94|802$وَٱلْعُدْوَٲنِ|and aggression|119|144|803$وَمَعْصِيَتِ|and disobedience|134|160|16717$ٱلرَّسُولِ|(to) the Messenger,|153|166|4120$وَتَنَـٰجَوْاْ|but hold secret counsel|176|183|16723$بِٱلْبِرِّ|for righteousness|134|148|447$وَٱلتَّقْوَىٰ‌ۖ|and piety.|98|112|4726$وَٱتَّقُواْ|And fear|78|92|467$ٱللَّهَ|Allah,|56|70|184$ٱلَّذِىٓ|the One Who,|112|119|138$إِلَيْهِ|to Him|62|294|296$تُحْشَرُونَ|you will be gathered.|159|391|1795$

5114.verse: إِنَّمَا|Only|55|64|102$ٱلنَّجْوَىٰ|the secret counsels|151|169|11489$مِنَ|(are) from|87|105|156$ٱلشَّيْطَـٰنِ|the Shaitaan|105|123|1466$لِيَحْزُنَ|that he may grieve|146|164|16724$ٱلَّذِينَ|those who|89|98|20$ءَامَنُواْ|believe,|82|91|84$وَلَيْسَ|but not|75|92|1667$بِضَآرِّهِمْ|he (can) harm them|152|169|16725$شَيْــًٔا|(in) anything|105|122|472$إِلَّا|except|65|82|86$بِإِذْنِ ٱللَّهِ‌ۚ|by Allahâ€™s permission.|160|169|3337$وَعَلَى|And upon|82|128|67$ٱللَّهِ|Allah|53|146|606$فَلْيَتَوَكَّلِ|let put (their) trust|148|241|3235$ٱلْمُؤْمِنُونَ|the believers.|113|160|2753$

5111.verse: Have you not considered that Allah knows what is in the heavens and what is on the earth? There is in no private conversation three but that He is the fourth of them, nor are there five but that He is the sixth of them - and no less than that and no more except that He is with them [in knowledge] wherever they are. Then He will inform them of what they did, on the Day of Resurrection. Indeed Allah is, of all things, Knowing.

5112.verse: Have you not considered those who were forbidden from private conversation, then they return to that which they were forbidden and converse among themselves about sin and aggression and disobedience to the Messenger? And when they come to you, they greet you with that [word] by which Allah does not greet you and say among themselves, "Why does Allah not punish us for what we say?" Sufficient for them is Hell, which they will [enter to] burn, and wretched is the destination.

5113.verse: O you who have believed, when you converse privately, do not converse about sin and aggression and disobedience to the Messenger but converse about righteousness and piety. And fear Allah, to whom you will be gathered.

5114.verse: Private conversation is only from Satan that he may grieve those who have believed, but he will not harm them at all except by permission of Allah. And upon Allah let the believers rely.

5115.verse: O you who have believed, when you are told, "Space yourselves" in assemblies, then make space; Allah will make space for you. And when you are told, "Arise," then arise; Allah will raise those who have believed among you and those who were given knowledge, by degrees. And Allah is Acquainted with what you do.
